description: Tools for monitoring backup systems and recovery status

tools.name: get_backup_job_status
tools.description: Retrieves the status of backup jobs for specified systems and time range, including success/failure status, start/end times, and error messages

start_time.description: Start time for backup job query in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2024-01-15T00:00:00Z')

end_time.description: End time for backup job query in ISO 8601 format (e.g., '2024-01-16T06:00:00Z')

system_names.description: List of specific system names to check. If empty, checks all systems

status_filter.description: Filter results by backup job status

tools.name: list_backup_systems
tools.description: Lists all systems configured for backup operations with their current operational status and last contact time

include_inactive.description: Whether to include systems that are currently inactive or offline

tools.name: get_backup_storage_metrics
tools.description: Retrieves storage utilization and capacity metrics for backup destinations, including space used, available space, and retention policy status

storage_location.description: Specific backup storage location or repository name. If not specified, returns metrics for all locations

include_historical.description: Whether to include historical storage trends from the past 7 days

tools.name: check_backup_alerts
tools.description: Retrieves active backup-related alerts and notifications, including failed jobs, storage capacity warnings, and system connectivity issues

hours_back.description: Number of hours to look back for alerts (default: 24)
